
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(pheatmap)
nameA <- c("apple", "banana", "cherry", "c1", "c2", "c3")
nameS <- c(6.1, 6.4, 6.5, 6.6, 7, 14)
mdf <- list(name = nameA, value = nameS)
mdf <- as.data.frame(mdf)
m <- c(6.1, 6.4, 6.5, 6.6, 7, 14)
colnames(m) <- paste("Col", 1:6)
pheatmap(m, display_numbers=T, show_colnames=T, cluster_rows=F, cluster_cols=F)
```
